homePage.subTitle: I love writing code and building websites.
homePage.introduction: Hello everyone! I am Tom Jin, a software engineer based on Taiwan. I'm here to share what I've read and thought about, and to show off the tools and websites I've created.

blogPage.description: Welcome to my blog! Here I will record my learning experience and knowledge in software development.
